critique: The document is a formal executive order. The president is trying to convey a sense of joy that the American public is expected to feel because the order is intended to ensure that the Federal Government can economically and efficiently provide the services that allow visitors of all means to enjoy the natural beauty of Federal parks and other Federal lands. The president is also trying to convey a sense of surprise that the American public is expected to feel because the order is intended to exempt seasonal recreational services from the minimum wage requirements of Executive Order 13658.
